thought: To craft smooth_quartz, I first need to craft quartz_block. To craft quartz_block, I need to place 4 quartz in a 2x2 square in the crafting table. Therefore, I will move the first quartz from slot 33 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok

Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1

Ok
act: smelt from slot 12 to slot 13 with quantity 1
